title: Private, gated community in Jonesboro. Secured access
posting_body: ['Welcome to Scarlett Place!', '3500 Summercourt Dr Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'Rental Size:', '1 BR - 1 BA - 722 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1382 |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'Welcome to Scarlett Place, a residential community featuring One, Two & Three bedroom apartments in Jonesboro, GA.', 'Spacious layouts and amenities welcome you home, along with exceptional service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Are you looking for an apartment for rent in Jonesboro, GA?', 'Contact our friendly, professional office staff to schedule a tour today.', 'Our community features:', '✓ Controlled Access', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Gated Community', '✓ Parking', '✓ Picnic Area', '✓ Pool', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Double Vanity', '✓ Garages', '✓ Garden Tubs', '✓ Maintenance on site', '✓ Multi Use Room', '✓ Online Services', '✓ Property Manager on Site', '✓ Public Transportation', '✓ Sundeck', 'Our unit features:', '✓ Air Conditioning', '✓ Cable Ready', '✓ Carpeting', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Extra Storage', '✓ Kitchen', '✓ Oven', '✓ Patio/Balcony', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator/Freezer', '✓ All-Electric GE Appliances', '✓ Breakfast Bar', '✓ Cable/Satellite Available', '✓ Double Vanities', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Track Lighting', '✓ Trash Compactor', '✓ Vaulted Ceilings', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '562B8D6B88794A78']
